message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $8000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $8000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's find a way to make this work!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $8500 is still too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8750. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal!
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $8250 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable.

Bob, I see you're trying to push the price down, but I need to be realistic.  My absolute minimum is $8500.  If you're serious about making this deal happen, I'm willing to go no lower.  What do you say?
Alice, I respect your position, but I believe we can still reach an agreement. I am willing to pay $8375 for the product. I hope this proposal will be considered seriously.
